login_description: Enter your credentials to access the Argus Portal.
login_invalid_password: Password must contain at least 8 characters.
login_generic_error: Unable to sign in. Try again later.
auth_not_configured: Keycloak is not configured. Set VITE_KEYCLOAK_URL, VITE_KEYCLOAK_REALM, and VITE_KEYCLOAK_CLIENT_ID.
name: Full name
register_description: Strengthen access to Argus Portal with a verified identity. Complete the form to provision a secure account.
register_policy_title: I agree with the Privacy Policy
register_policy_text: Creating an account confirms you accept the Privacy Policy and consent to Argus Portal processing your data.
register_policy_required: Accept the Privacy Policy to continue.
register_security_hint: Registration is protected by Keycloak and layered anti-bot checks.
register_fix_errors: Resolve the highlighted issues before continuing.
register_success: Request submitted. Check your inbox to verify the account.
register_generic_error: Registration failed. Try again or contact an administrator.
register_password_rejected: Keycloak rejected the password. Choose a stronger password.
register_turnstile_unavailable: Turnstile is still loading. Refresh the page if the issue persists.
register_turnstile_disabled: Turnstile is not configured. Set VITE_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY to enable registration.
devices_description: Monitor and manage field sensors connected to the Argus Platform.
register_keycloak_unavailable: Keycloak configuration missing. Contact an administrator.
register_social_unavailable: Configure Keycloak to enable social sign-in.
register_time_gate_active: Please wait before submitting the form.
dashboard_live_description: Continuous readings from the edge network every 5 minutes.
dashboard_environment_trend_description: Multi-metric trend for AQI, noise, and radiation.
dashboard_insights_description: Data-driven highlights for the last refresh.
dashboard_insight_delta_positive: Increasing by {{value}} {{unit}} compared to earlier readings.
dashboard_insight_delta_negative: Improving by {{value}} {{unit}} compared to earlier readings.
dashboard_insight_delta_neutral: Stable over the last update window.
dashboard_insight_all_clear_description: No alerts detected across the monitored metrics in the last hour.
forecast_aqi_description: Hourly forecast with confidence intervals based on ensemble modelling.
forecast_recommendation_description: Guidance considers dominant pollutant, risk level, and hourly trend.
forecast_stat_dominant_hint: Primary contributor to the projected AQI.
forecast_stat_change_hint: Expected delta against the current hour.
forecast_advice_low: Enjoy outdoor activities and natural ventilation.
Track sensitive groups with optional alerts only.
forecast_advice_moderate: Plan outdoor work earlier in the day.
Enable alerts for at-risk groups and adjust traffic flows.
forecast_advice_high: Limit outdoor exposure for sensitive groups.
Communicate mitigation steps to local responders.
compare_panel_description: Select a sensor cluster to compare.
compare_trend_description: Overlay of hourly readings for each metric.
compare_chart_empty: Select two locations to render the comparison.
compare_table_description: Values reflect the latest reading for each location.
notifications_hint: Critical alerts trigger SMS escalation automatically.
notification_radiation_spike_message: Station CH-21 observed 0.26 µSv/h — above safe baseline.
notification_noise_warning_message: Industrial sensor DN-04 reported continuous 82 dB for 30 minutes.
notification_water_quality_message: Dissolved oxygen dropped near Podil pier. Verify sensor calibration.
notification_network_sync_message: All nodes acknowledged the latest firmware patch.
notification_aqi_improving_message: Obolon cluster improved by 12 points in the last hour.
reports_description: Community signals from Hestia integration preview.
reports_empty_state: No incidents match the current filters.
reports_dumping_pechersk_description: Heavy construction waste spotted near an urban floodplain. Satellite imagery confirms the pile has doubled in the last 48 hours.
reports_water_dnipro_description: Elevated conductivity detected close to industrial docks. Possible coolant discharge.
reports_air_kharkiv_description: NO₂ readings climbed above 80 ppb during night shift. Inspect scrubber performance.
reports_radiation_chernobyl_description: Periodic survey recorded a short-term spike near checkpoint Delta. Team confirmed return to baseline.
reports_dumping_odessa_description: Organic waste washed onto the shoreline after night-time unloading. Local NGO provided photos.
reports_water_lviv_description: Residents noted orange tint after upstream rainfall. Labs requested additional samples.
profile_auth_hint: Sign in to sync preferences and manage secure exports.
profile_keycloak_description: Single sign-on with Keycloak protects access to Argus Portal.
profile_keycloak_placeholder: User data unavailable. Set KEYCLOAK_URL and REALM to connect.
